page.title: 17HOUSING
page.content: The house I live in belongs to my parents. They have bought it so it is privately owned. It is about 15 years old. It is semi detached and is built of bricks with tiles on the roof. A couple of years ago we put an extension on it. We knocked a hole in the garage wall and then built a new garage. My house has a small garden. There are three bedrooms. My mum and dad have the smallest, my sister and I have the middle size bedroom and my two brothers have the biggest. I live at 21,Knowles Close which is near the park. We have central heating and we cook by gas. We have a bathroom and a toilet. There is a garden at the back and one at the front too.
